formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DBdel' =-
[Synopsis] Delete a key from the database
[Description] DBdel(family/key): This application will delete a key from the Asterisk database. This application has been DEPRECATED in favor of the DB_DELETE function.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -6,3 +6,4 @@ [Description] DBdel(family/key): This application will delete a key from the Asterisk database. + This application has been DEPRECATED in favor of the DB_DELETE function.
